name: Salesforce Trigger
semantic_context: Fetches data from Salesforce and starts the workflow on specified polling intervals.
natural_language_description: 这是 Salesforce Trigger 节点。主要用于: Fetches data from Salesforce and starts the workflow on specified polling intervals.

pollTimes.name: pollTimes
pollTimes.description: Time at which polling should occur
pollTimes.natural_language_description: 参数名: Poll Times | 作用: Time at which polling should occur | 默认值: {'item': [{'mode': 'everyMinute'}]}

triggerOn.name: triggerOn
triggerOn.description: Which Salesforce event should trigger the node
triggerOn.natural_language_description: 参数名: Trigger On | 作用: Which Salesforce event should trigger the node
available_options: Account Created (值: accountCreated) - When a new account is created
Account Updated (值: accountUpdated) - When an existing account is modified
Attachment Created (值: attachmentCreated) - When a file is uploaded and attached to an object
Attachment Updated (值: attachmentUpdated) - When an existing file is modified
Case Created (值: caseCreated) - When a new case is created
Case Updated (值: caseUpdated) - When an existing case is modified
Contact Created (值: contactCreated) - When a new contact is created
Contact Updated (值: contactUpdated) - When an existing contact is modified
Custom Object Created (值: customObjectCreated) - When a new object of a given type is created
Custom Object Updated (值: customObjectUpdated) - When an object of a given type is modified
Lead Created (值: leadCreated) - When a new lead is created
Lead Updated (值: leadUpdated) - When an existing lead is modified
Opportunity Created (值: opportunityCreated) - When a new opportunity is created
Opportunity Updated (值: opportunityUpdated) - When an existing opportunity is modified
Task Created (值: taskCreated) - When a new task is created
Task Updated (值: taskUpdated) - When an existing task is modified
User Created (值: userCreated) - When a new user is created
User Updated (值: userUpdated) - When an existing user is modified

customObject.name: customObject
customObject.description: Name of the custom object. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
customObject.natural_language_description: 参数名: Custom Object Name or ID | 作用: Name of the custom object. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)
